p: Tentative identification of the main compounds recorded by LC-DAD was performed on the basis of their accurate masses using high-resolution mass spectrometry. The mass accuracy for all separated compounds was within 2 ppm. The identified compounds and their MS data are shown in Figure 1 and Table 1. The main peaks on the UHPLC-chromatogram belong to chlorogenic acid, rutin and caffeoylquinic acid isomers. These compounds were previously described in S. virgaurea and some other Solidago species [ 2, 37]. However, we were unable to characterize the compound corresponding to peak 8 at m/z 349.0934. The total phenolic and total flavonoid content of the goldenrod methanol extract were determined and they were 50.83 mg GAE/g dry weight and 33.15 QE/g dry weight, respectively.
